newsitem.title: DUBAI: PRESS DIGEST - United Arab Emirates - Feb 11.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - United Arab Emirates - Feb 11.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the United Arab Emirates press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Eid greetings for UAE President Sheikh Zaid bin Sultan al-Nahayan.
- Dubai Economic Department becomes Dubai Department of Economic Development.
- Iraqi traders flock to Dubai to buy food and other commodities.
- Diamond Electronics to open Dubai music store.
